channel.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
channel.description:
Well once villavu goes down who is it going to be? maybe Wizzup? or dankness
if anyone is willing to do it and will be active enough please post here and volunteer, I would like to keep the SRL staff in charge of srl things ;D

item.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“phantombmx, post:19, topic:4607”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=6000.msg72654#msg72654 date=1153292681]
well what would the difference be if we did move the dev section to a new place?
[/quote]
as megan said, just at mopars means all our eggs are in one basket… also if we have a seperate forum, jaggy wouldn’t be able to track where the source of SRL is… all they would know is that SRL is released at mopars…[/quote]

I dont see how that matters at all, jagex has no claim whatsoever about SRL (besides, the actual source of SRL now is sourceforge.net)

Read full topic

item.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
item.dc:creator: @driger1592 driger1592
item.description:
@driger1592 wrote:

I vote for Dankness’s idea. I just feel more secure that way, for some reason. It would be Almost the same security as here, but I’d just feel more secure at a private forum again, for some reason.

Also, Dankness, I would be willing to help you set it up. If you have any questions, please let me know

Read full topic
item.source: Who is going to be in charge of applications?

item.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

Pyro:

Now now mopar dont tempt fate. What dankness is talkign about is cool i think. Kinda like what srl was like before it went public. Even though i wasnt a dev then i saw it because sdcti introduced me into it. This is why it was good to have fawki. Cause he just made executive desicions. Now we are scrambled somewhat on what we shoudl do with SRL

thats what im talking about, bringing back the days when only the SRL dev’s had access to the Developer forum. Those were in my opion the good ol’ days of SRL but let’s make a vote on what to do thats the democratic method of doin this. hah I was tryin to get Vbulletin on my server but i ran out of time messin with it tonight think i got something messd up in my config and it keeps screwin up atm. I already have a PhpBulletin on it but i dont really like it. but someone make a poll and let’s figure this out.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Bebemycat2:

I agree with dankness, the problem I had with mopar hosting SRL is that we are sorta ptting all our “cheatings eggs in one basket”. And I don’t like that idea.

what could possibly go wrong? I backup a minimum of once a week to my harddrive, and nothing illegal is hosted here, we are untouchable

Read full topic

item.source: Who is going to be in charge of applications?

item.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Dankness:

Iv been talking to Fawki about this, we didnt really solve nething but I have unused webhosting already and i was thinking about taking the SRL Main Page and moving it to my hosting, then maybe making a SRL Developer’s only forum but keep all the SRL Members, and all that other junk on Mopars or somewhere else. I do not have time to handle everything but i will make time to handle the Developer’s and keeping SRL a quality include. Mopar is doin a great job and im glad he set these temp forums up for us but i’m thinking if we had our own seperate private forum just for the developer’s it would be more secure and we could all be more confortable posting our private works there and discussing private SRL matters there. Now to the bringin in more SRL developer’s i think we need to put a complete freeze on new developer’s until the dust settles and then we should poll them in as we did before but they must go thru the same things as before such as a Email with why they should be a developer and a example script of there knowledge. I will futher discuss the future later this week.

Its entirely up to you guys where you host it, but just so you know you should feel safe posting private things here, not even the global mods can see this boards (except for the global mods that are srl devs) in fact the only people that can see these boards that are not srl devs are two admins, Algas and Waffendennis, I trust them because if I didnt they would not be admins here, and they wouldnt have been so at kaitnieks either, but again its up to you

Read full topic
item.source: Who is going to be in charge of applications?

item.title: Who is going to be in charge of applications?
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

Iv been talking to Fawki about this, we didnt really solve nething but I have unused webhosting already and i was thinking about taking the SRL Main Page and moving it to my hosting, then maybe making a SRL Developer’s only forum but keep all the SRL Members, and all that other junk on Mopars or somewhere else. I do not have time to handle everything but i will make time to handle the Developer’s and keeping SRL a quality include. Mopar is doin a great job and im glad he set these temp forums up for us but i’m thinking if we had our own seperate private forum just for the developer’s it would be more secure and we could all be more confortable posting our private works there and discussing private SRL matters there. Now to the bringin in more SRL developer’s i think we need to put a complete freeze on new developer’s until the dust settles and then we should poll them in as we did before but they must go thru the same things as before such as a Email with why they should be a developer and a example script of there knowledge. I will futher discuss the future later this week.
